title: Werner state
summary: A Werner state[1] is a d 2 {\displaystyle d^{2}} × d 2 {\displaystyle d^{2}} -dimensional bipartite quantum state density matrix that is invariant under all unitary operators of the form U ⊗ U {\displaystyle U\otimes U} . That is, it is a bipartite quantum state ρ A B {\displaystyle \rho _{AB}} that satisfies
